To expose config and environment variables to the rest of your app, you will need to define runtime configuration in your

On server-side, the entire runtime config is available on the server-side, but it is read-only to avoid context sharing.

In Nuxt 3, you can get started with debugging your application directly in the browser as well as in your IDE.
The nightly release channel allows using Nuxt built directly from the latest commits to the repository.
